701992f-a.text:
Villa Avenue, east side, south from Van Cortlandt Avenue. The houses bear Nos. 3196 to 3184.

May 5, 1938.

P. L. Sperr
701992f-a.folder: Villa Avenue & Van Cortlandt Avenue, Bronx, NY
701992f-a.original_title: Bronx: Villa Avenue - Van Cortlandt Avenue

701959f-a.text:
Van Cortlandt Avenue, south side, east from (No. 12) and including Villa Avenue to Grand Concourse.
May 5, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
701959f-a.folder: Van Cortlandt Avenue & Villa Avenue, Bronx, NY
701959f-a.original_title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Avenue - Villa Avenue
